name: LowDoseICSFormoterol
title: Low Dose ICS Formoterol
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Oral inhaled corticosteroid preparations in combination with formoterol),(Data Element Scope: DRUG_CLASS_MEMBERS: PHARMACOLOGIC),(Inclusion Criteria: All generics (with different strengths) and brands (with different strengths)),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
